title: News. Views. Hughes - October 10, 2019 (17:00 ET)
text:
Trump admin softens Huawei ban

The Trump administration has given the greenlight to US companies to sell non-sensitive equipment to Huawei. More than 130 applications have been submitted to the Commerce Department to continue business with Huawei despite the US government ban thereof. RT America’s Sara Montes de Oca reports. Then John Grace, founder and president of Investor’s Advantage Corp. joins Scottie Nell Hughes to share his insights. He also weighs in on the future of investment in Asia and companies leaving China to avoid tariffs.

GOP dares Congress to impeach Trump

GOP analyst Eric Mitchell and legal analyst and criminal defense attorney Anthony Tall join Scottie Nell Hughes to discuss President Trump’s falling popularity and the arrest of two associates of Trump lawyer and former New York mayor Rudy Giuliani in connection with Ukrainian meddling in US elections.
